entry.title: Bustar - Consulting Business WordPress Theme Intro

media:group.media:title: Bustar - Consulting Business WordPress Theme Intro
media:group.media:description: Bustar is a premium WordPress theme crafted for versatile consulting and professional service businesses. Whether your focus is Business Consulting, Marketing , Business Strategy, Corporate , HR Consulting, Financial Advisory, Visa Consulting, Insurance , IT , Startup , Banking , or Tax Consulting – Bustar provides the ideal solution to build a modern, professional, and engaging website. It includes 18+ beautifully designed Demo Homepages (Multi + Onepages) along with a rich set of inner pages such as Services, Portfolios, About, Contact, FAQ, Team, Pricing, and multiple blog layouts. With its elegant layouts, user-friendly customization, and powerful features, Bustar helps you present your expertise, build credibility, and attract clients seamlessly, making it the ultimate theme for consulting professionals across industries.

entry.title: How to UpdateGlobal Color, Typography & Customizer - Zerodot Elementor Business WordPress Theme

media:group.media:title: How to UpdateGlobal Color, Typography & Customizer - Zerodot Elementor Business WordPress Theme
media:group.media:description: Zerodot is the Ultimate Multipurpose Elementor Business WordPress Theme. Built with the intuitive Elementor page builder, Zerodot empowers users to craft stunning websites without writing a single line of code. It is the perfect choice for creative agencies, freelancers, construction, lawyer law firm, creative agency companies, digital agency, dital marketing agency, small business, any business, any personal portfolio, and professionals looking to stand out in the digital space.

entry.title: Fancy Post Grid Shortcode Tutorial – Display Posts Anywhere in WordPress

media:group.media:title: Fancy Post Grid Shortcode Tutorial – Display Posts Anywhere in WordPress

entry.title: Fancy Post Grid Free Plugin Tutorial — Elementor, Gutenberg, & Shortcodes | Complete User Guide

media:group.media:title: Fancy Post Grid Free Plugin Tutorial — Elementor, Gutenberg, & Shortcodes | Complete User Guide
media:group.media:description:
In this video, you'll learn exactly how to use the Fancy Post Grid plugin's shortcode to display beautiful post layouts anywhere on your WordPress site — including pages, posts, widgets, and even custom templates!
✅ What You’ll Learn:
How to generate and copy the shortcode
How to customize layout types: Grid, List, Slider, Isotope
How to insert the shortcode into Classic Editor, Gutenberg, or Elementor
How to use Gutenberg, Elementor OR shortcode parameters for full control (categories, post count, style, etc.)
💡 Fancy Post Grid supports 34 styles via shortcode: 🔹 12 Grid Layouts 🔹 8 List Layouts 🔹 7 Sliders 🔹 7 Isotope Filter Layouts
⚙️ No coding required. Just copy, paste, and customize!
📎 Perfect for bloggers, designers, developers, and agencies looking to display posts in a stylish way across their site.
🔗 Try Fancy Post Grid today and take full control of your WordPress post display!
👍 Like | 💬 Comment | 🔔 Subscribe for more plugin tutorials and WordPress tips.
#FancyPostGrid #ShortcodeTutorial #WordPressPlugin #DisplayPosts #PostGrid #WordPress2025 #Elementor #Gutenberg

entry.title: How to update Header & Footer from Header Footer Builder on Techto Business Technology WP Theme

media:group.media:title: How to update Header & Footer from Header Footer Builder on Techto Business Technology WP Theme
media:group.media:description: Welcome to our Techto – Business & IT Technology WordPress Theme. It is a modern, responsive WordPress theme made for Business and IT websites and also perfect for any business related to business consulting, AI technology business, startups, tech companies, software firms, digital agencies, seo agencies etc .There are more great options available comparing to new modern designed WordPress themes as like template library, mega menu builder, header footer builder and it comes with from sleek designs to robust functionalities and 24 Pre-build demo websites ready to use and unlimited innerpage building options through template library. Also have awesome inner pages such as Services, Portfolios, About, Contact, FAQ, Solutions, multiple blog layouts etc. It provides the ideal platform to elevate your digital presence with an attractive website.
